Tucson recieves the message and sends one back to Perceptor, also heavilly =
encrypted and for only his systems to have access to.

"Very well.  When al=
l is said and done, I'd like very much to hear what you have to tell me. Se=
nd a message for me, to Lord Elder, Stanton and Bump.  I want Legacy cast o=
ut of the Ark as soon as it's possible.  And if he dares to return, I will =
deal with him personally. After that, I want the Ark reconfigured to recogn=
ize him as an enemy.  Therefore it will secure your parameter safely, from =
harm, if he dares to try to re enter the Ark. I'll let you have the honors =
of reconfiguring the Ark to those specifications."

Night Shift looks to Tu=
cson.

"Um, you got a not so friendly look on your face..  What gives?"

Tu=
cson turns to Night Shift.

"Legacy..  I should have listened to Stanton an=
d now, I'm paying for that mistake.  He's beyraying us, and all right under=
 my nose..."

Night Shift puts a hand on his buddy's arm.

"Hey, you were j=
ust ben' a Prime, you were givn' 'em a chance, like any Prime would do, 'sp=
ecially Optimus.  There's nothn' wrong with that, hey, we can't all be perf=
ect... But if ya ask me, Legacy, he reminds me of someone real familliar...=
  Remember Shockwave?"

Tucson nodds.

"Shockwave... That's right...  Why d=
idn't I make that connection earlier?  Anyway, right now we have to focus o=
n what's most important, and right now, keeping everyone safe is the most i=
mportant issue at hand."

He looks back to Kup.

"Kup, for now, let's do wh=
at the voice demands of us, I have a feeling if we just play along, an oppo=
rtunity will come to get out of this predicament... After all...  Someone i=
s still on their way here.."

He narrows his eyes further, and concentrates=
 deeply and this time, he attempts to contact Legacy.

" When I took the po=
wer of the Matrix, I swore to honor my comrades by keeping them safe, and t=
rust them as equals.  I gave you that chance, and you repay me by turning y=
our back on my factions.  I will not tolerate such insuborination, and it i=
s with that in mind, that I am demanding you leave the Ark  and renounce yo=
ur position among us effective immediatley.  You will not give Stanton, Bum=
p or Lord Elder any grief.  If I hear of your reistance, I will give them t=
he orders to terminate you on contact.  Am I understood?!"

For the first t=
ime,his voice becomes gruff, as it did when he was only a regular Autobot. =
 His temper returns a slight, as it is now heard by his comrades.

Night Sh=
ift swallows hard.

"We're really lucky guys... We're lucky we're on his go=
od side, because if we weren't, it would really be curtains for us too.  I =
know Tucson, he doesn't put up with Scrap.."

I ask only this, why?  Why

ower, so that they can live without fear

fice myself to do so, then so be it."

lmly, he closes his optics, waiting to see if
